title: Dispute Auto-Resolution Engine
description:
Rules engine для автоматического разрешения споров + escalation к оператору.

## Specs
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/16-dispute-auto-resolution.md
- .memory-bank/03-feature-specs/06-dispute-resolution.md

## Что реализовать

### deal-api
- DisputePort interface: openDispute(dealId, reason, evidence), resolveDispute(dealId, outcome, operatorNote)
- DisputeOutcome enum: REFUND_FULL, PAYOUT, PARTIAL_REFUND, ESCALATE
- DisputeReason enum: POST_DELETED, CONTENT_EDITED, CREATIVE_TIMEOUT, CHANNEL_RESTRICTED, OTHER
- EvidenceType enum: POST_CHECK, TIMELINE, SCREENSHOT, TON_TX, CHANNEL_STATUS

### deal-impl
- DisputeResolutionEngine: evaluates rules in priority order
- DisputeRule interface: matches(dispute, evidence) → boolean, outcome() → DisputeOutcome
- Concrete rules (priority):
  1. PostDeletedRule (10) → REFUND_FULL
  2. ContentEditedRule (20) → REFUND_FULL
  3. CreativeTimeoutRule (30) → REFUND_FULL
  4. ChannelRestrictedRule (40) → REFUND_FULL
  5. VerificationPassedRule (10) → PAYOUT
  6. NoEvidenceRule (50, 48h) → PAYOUT
  7. ConflictingEvidenceRule (60) → ESCALATE
  8. HighValueRule (70, >1000 TON) → ESCALATE
  9. FallbackRule (999) → ESCALATE

- DisputeEvidenceCollector: собирает evidence из delivery results, deal events, ton_transactions

### REST API
- POST /api/v1/deals/{id}/dispute — open dispute

### Key Rotation
1. New key version N+1
2. New writes use N+1
3. Background: re-encrypt key_version < N+1
4. Decommission old keys

### Security Rules
- NEVER cache decrypted values
- NEVER log PII
- NEVER store PII in Redis

title: Deal State Machine + Transition Service
description:
Core state machine с 17 состояниями, переходы с валидацией, optimistic locking.

## Specs
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/35-deal-workflow-engine.md

## Что реализовать

### deal-api
- DealPort interface: create, transition, getById, listByUser
- DealDto record: id, advertiserId, channelId, status, amountNano, commissionNano, createdAt, etc.
- DealTransitionCommand record: dealId, targetStatus, actorId, actorType
- DealCreatedEvent, DealStateChangedEvent records

### deal-impl
- DealTransitionService: core state machine logic
  1. Validate: current status → target status (allowed transitions table)
  2. Validate: actor has permission (ABAC check)
  3. Optimistic lock: UPDATE deals SET status=?, version=version+1 WHERE id=? AND version=?
  4. Append deal_events
  5. Insert notification_outbox (transactional outbox)
  6. Return DealStateChangedEvent

- DealRepository (jOOQ): CRUD + optimistic locking
- DealEventRepository (jOOQ): append-only insert

### State Transition Table
DRAFT → OFFER_PENDING (advertiser), OFFER_PENDING → ACCEPTED/REJECTED/NEGOTIATING (owner),
NEGOTIATING → ACCEPTED/REJECTED (owner/advertiser), ACCEPTED → AWAITING_PAYMENT (system),
AWAITING_PAYMENT → FUNDED (system/deposit watcher), FUNDED → CREATIVE_SUBMITTED (advertiser),
CREATIVE_SUBMITTED → CREATIVE_APPROVED/REVISION_REQUESTED (owner),
CREATIVE_APPROVED → SCHEDULED (system), SCHEDULED → PUBLISHED (system/post scheduler),
PUBLISHED → DELIVERY_VERIFYING (system), DELIVERY_VERIFYING → COMPLETED_RELEASED/DISPUTED (system),
Any funded state → DISPUTED (either party), DISPUTED → REFUNDED/COMPLETED_RELEASED/PARTIALLY_REFUNDED (operator/system)
Any pre-funded → CANCELLED/EXPIRED (system/user)

### REST API
- POST /api/v1/deals — create offer
- POST /api/v1/deals/{id}/transition — state transition
- GET /api/v1/deals/{id} — detail
- GET /api/v1/deals — list (as advertiser/owner)

## Подсказки
- version column для optimistic locking (jOOQ .set(DEALS.VERSION, DEALS.VERSION.plus(1)).where(DEALS.VERSION.eq(currentVersion)))
- Все переходы — single DB transaction (deal + deal_events + outbox)
- deal_events: append-only, trigger prevents UPDATE/DELETE

title: Telegram Channel API Service (getChat, getChatMember, getChatAdministrators)
description:
Facade для Telegram API методов работы с каналами. Фундамент для верификации.

## Предпосылки
Текущий TelegramSender умеет только отправлять сообщения. Для регистрации каналов, 
верификации админов и мониторинга нужен отдельный сервис для Channel API методов.

## Что реализовать

### communication-api
- TelegramChannelPort interface:
  - getChat(channelId) → ChatInfo
  - getChatMember(channelId, userId) → ChatMemberInfo
  - getChatAdministrators(channelId) → List<ChatMemberInfo>
  - getChatMemberCount(channelId) → int
  - ChatInfo record: id, title, username, type, description, subscriberCount
  - ChatMemberInfo record: userId, status(CREATOR/ADMINISTRATOR/MEMBER/LEFT/KICKED), canPostMessages, canEditMessages, canDeleteMessages, canManageChat
  - ChatMemberStatus enum: CREATOR, ADMINISTRATOR, MEMBER, RESTRICTED, LEFT, KICKED

### communication-impl
- TelegramChannelService implements TelegramChannelPort
  - Использует pengrad TelegramBot: bot.execute(new GetChat(channelId))
  - bot.execute(new GetChatMember(channelId, userId))
  - bot.execute(new GetChatAdministrators(channelId))
  - bot.execute(new GetChatMemberCount(channelId))

### Resilience
- Circuit breaker: то же что Telegram Bot (window 50, threshold 40%)
- Rate limiter: 1 req/s к одному каналу (Redis)
- Cache: getChat → Redis 5min, getChatAdministrators → Redis 15min
- Fallback при circuit open: return cached, flag stale

### Error Handling
- 400 Bad Request (chat not found) → ChannelNotFoundException
- 403 Forbidden (bot not member) → BotNotMemberException
- 429 Rate limited → respect retry_after, exponential backoff

title: Bot Membership Monitoring (my_chat_member webhook)
description:
Обработка my_chat_member webhook updates: реагирование на добавление/удаление бота из канала.

## Предпосылки
Telegram отправляет my_chat_member update когда статус бота изменяется в чате.
Без этого — деактивация каналов будет только ручной или по таймеру.

## Что реализовать

### Webhook Update (communication)
1. Добавить "my_chat_member" в allowed_updates при setWebhook
   - Текущий: ["message", "callback_query"]
   - Новый: ["message", "callback_query", "my_chat_member"]

2. Расширить BotDispatcher для обработки my_chat_member updates
   - Новый handler type: MyChatMemberHandler interface
   - UpdateContext: добавить myChatMember() accessor

### MyChatMemberHandler (communication-impl)
- BotChannelStatusHandler implements MyChatMemberHandler:
  - Фильтр: только для каналов (chat.type = "channel")
  - Логика по new_chat_member.status:

  **Bot added as admin (member → administrator):**
  - Если канал уже зарегистрирован: reactivate (is_active = true)
  - Если не зарегистрирован: ignore (регистрация через API)
  - Log: [CHANNEL] Bot added as admin to {channelId}

  **Bot removed (administrator/member → left/kicked):**

  - Уведомить owner: CHANNEL_BOT_REMOVED notification
  - Если есть активные deals: alert operator

  - Деактивировать: бот не может постить без admin прав

  - Проверить can_post_messages
  - Если false: деактивировать + уведомить
  - Если true: reactivate

## Предпосылки
Сценарий: owner зарегистрировал канал, потом удалил бота, но advertiser пытается

Перед INSERT INTO deals добавить валидацию:
1. Проверить channel.is_active = true
2. Если последняя верификация > 15 минут — force refresh:
   - TelegramChannelPort.getChatMember(channelId, botId)
   - Если бот не admin → деактивировать канал + reject deal
3. Проверить что канал не заблокирован (disputes > threshold)

### Freshness Policy
- channels.bot_verified_at TIMESTAMPTZ — время последней проверки
- Если bot_verified_at > now() - 15min → skip verification (use cached)
- Если bot_verified_at < now() - 15min → call Telegram API
- Если Telegram API недоступен (circuit open) → разрешить deal, пометить "unverified"

- LedgerPort interface: record(entries), getBalance(accountId), getEntries(accountId, cursor)

- AccountBalance record: accountId, balanceNano, lastEntryId, version

### financial-impl
- LedgerService: core bookkeeping
  1. Validate: SUM(debit) = SUM(credit) per tx_ref
  2. Check idempotency_key (DB-backed, ledger_idempotency_keys table)
  3. INSERT ledger_entries (append-only)
  4. UPDATE account_balances (CQRS projection, optimistic lock)
  5. Всё в одной транзакции

- AccountBalanceRepository (jOOQ): upsert balance projection

### Key Invariants
- NEVER UPDATE/DELETE ledger_entries (trigger enforced)
- SUM(debit_nano) = SUM(credit_nano) per tx_ref
- idempotency_key UNIQUE per partition (monthly)
- All amounts in nanoTON (BIGINT, no floats)

### Account Types
Singleton: PLATFORM_TREASURY, EXTERNAL_TON (contra, может быть отрицательным), NETWORK_FEES, DUST_WRITEOFF
Per-deal: ESCROW:{deal_id}, COMMISSION:{deal_id}, OVERPAYMENT:{deal_id}, PARTIAL_DEPOSIT:{deal_id}, LATE_DEPOSIT:{deal_id}
Per-user: OWNER_PENDING:{user_id}

### Redis Balance Cache
- Key: balance:{account_id}, TTL 5min
- Invalidate on ledger write
- Fallback to DB on cache miss

- jOOQ batch insert для paired entries (debit + credit)
- ledger_idempotency_keys: INSERT ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING, check affected rows
- account_balances.balance_nano: NO >= 0 constraint (EXTERNAL_TON goes negative)
- version для optimistic locking

**Release**: DEBIT ESCROW, CREDIT COMMISSION:{deal_id} (10%) + CREDIT OWNER_PENDING:{user_id} (90%)

title: Payout Execution + Commission Sweep
description:
Payout executor worker, commission sweep, network fee accounting.

## Specs
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/30-payout-execution-flow.md
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/40-payout-wallet-architecture.md

- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/41-unclaimed-payouts.md

## Что реализовать

### PayoutExecutorWorker (financial-impl)
Kafka consumer (escrow.commands, cg-payout-executor):
1. Acquire lock: lock:payout:{deal_id} (60s)
2. Check idempotency: idempotency:payout:{deal_id} (Redis SET NX EX 86400)
3. Decrypt payout address from PII Vault
4. Submit TX via TON sendBoc
5. Record ton_transactions (direction=OUT, status=PENDING)
6. Poll for confirmation (1 confirmation)
7. Record withdrawal entries: DEBIT OWNER_PENDING, CREDIT EXTERNAL_TON
8. Record fee: DEBIT PLATFORM_TREASURY, CREDIT NETWORK_FEES

### RefundExecutorWorker (financial-impl)
Same pattern for refunds: DEBIT ESCROW, CREDIT EXTERNAL_TON, fee accounting.

### CommissionSweepService (financial-impl)
@Scheduled daily 02:00 UTC:
1. Find COMMISSION:{deal_id} accounts with balance > dust threshold
2. Build batch TX: subwallet → treasury_wallet
3. Ledger: DEBIT COMMISSION:{deal_id}, CREDIT PLATFORM_TREASURY
4. Fee: DEBIT PLATFORM_TREASURY, CREDIT NETWORK_FEES
5. Idempotency: sweep:{date}:{account_id}

### Commission Calculation
- commission_tiers table: tiered rates (basis points)
- commissionNano = dealAmountNano * rateBp / 10_000L (floor)
- ownerPayoutNano = dealAmountNano - commissionNano (exact)
- Invariant: commission + owner_payout == deal_amount

### Unclaimed Payouts
- Owner без TON address: OWNER_PENDING accumulates
- Notification: 3 reminders (1d, 7d, 21d)
- 30-day timeout: operator review

### Configuration
- PayoutProperties: max-retries(5), retry-backoff
- CommissionProperties: default-rate-bp(1000), sweep.cron
- NetworkFeeProperties: default-estimate-nano

## Подсказки
- Зависит от: Ledger, TON SDK, Escrow, PII Vault
- Single-phase ledger recording (AFTER on-chain confirmation)
- Dust < 1000 nanoTON: monthly write-off
- NEVER drop payout command — DLQ + alert if all retries exhausted

title: Rate Limiting + External API Resilience
description:
Multi-layer rate limiting (Redis token bucket) + Circuit breakers (Resilience4j).

## Specs
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/27-rate-limiting-strategy.md
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/28-external-api-resilience.md

## Что реализовать

### Rate Limiting (shared + app)
- RateLimitFilter (Spring filter): Redis token bucket per user/endpoint
- Lua script: token bucket алгоритм
- Tiers: Auth 5/min, Deals write 20/min, Deals read 60/min, Global 120/min
- Business limits: 10 active deals/advertiser, 5 deals/channel/day, 3 disputes/user/week
- Outbound: Guava RateLimiter — TON API 10 req/s, Telegram 30 msg/s
- Response headers: X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset
- Auth brute-force: progressive delays + lockout after 11 failures

### Circuit Breakers (app)
- TON Center: window 20, threshold 50%, open 30s, half-open 5 calls
- Telegram Bot: window 50, threshold 40%, open 15s, half-open 10 calls
- Telegram Platform: time-based 60s, threshold 30%, open 10s
- Bulkhead: TON 10 concurrent, Telegram 30 concurrent
- Timeouts: TON 35s, Telegram 15s, Platform 8s

### Fallbacks
- TON down: skip poll, queue payouts, alert operator
- Telegram down: queue in outbox, retry later

### Metrics
- ratelimit.requests.total/limited{tier,endpoint}
- resilience4j.circuitbreaker.state/calls{name}

## Подсказки
- Resilience4j + Spring Boot starter
- Redis Lua script для atomic token bucket
- 429 → Retry-After header

title: Delivery Verifier
description:
24h retention verification: 5 checkpoints, content hash comparison.

## Specs
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/17-delivery-verifier-telegram-api.md
- .memory-bank/03-feature-specs/05-delivery-verification.md

## Что реализовать

### delivery-impl
- DeliveryVerifierWorker (Kafka consumer: delivery.commands, VERIFY_DELIVERY)
  1. Parse VerifyDeliveryCommand: channelId, messageId, contentHash, publishedAt, checkNumber
  2. Call Telegram API: getChat (verify access), forwardMessage/getMessages (read content)
  3. Compute content hash: SHA-256(normalized_text + sorted_file_ids + sorted_button_labels)
  4. Compare with original contentHash
  5. Emit result → delivery.results

- ContentHasher: SHA-256 hashing of post content
  - Normalize: lowercase, trim whitespace, sort arrays
  - Include: text + media file_ids + button labels

- VerificationScheduler: schedules 5 checks per deal
  - +1h, +4h, +8h, +16h, +24h after publish
  - Each check = VERIFY_DELIVERY command with check_number

### Failure Detection
- Post deleted → POST_DELETED → trigger DISPUTED
- Content edited → CONTENT_EDITED → trigger DISPUTED
- Channel made private → CHANNEL_RESTRICTED → trigger DISPUTED
- All 5 checks passed → DELIVERY_VERIFIED → trigger COMPLETED_RELEASED

### Critical Rule
- 24h timeout с unresolved checks → DISPUTED (NOT auto-approve!)
- Это money-loss vector если auto-approve

### Kafka Topics
- Input: delivery.commands (VERIFY_DELIVERY)
- Output: delivery.results (DELIVERY_VERIFIED / DELIVERY_FAILED)

### Metrics
- delivery.verifier.checks{result=PASS|FAIL|ERROR}
- delivery.verifier.disputes{reason}

## Подсказки
- forwardMessage to self → read content → deleteMessage (cleanup)
- pengrad: bot.execute(new ForwardMessage(selfChatId, channelId, messageId))
- Зависит от: Post Scheduler (needs published_message_id)

title: Deal Timeout Scheduler
description:
DB-polling scheduler для автоматического expire/cancel/refund по дедлайнам.

## Specs
- .memory-bank/14-implementation-specs/19-deal-timeout-scheduler.md

## Что реализовать

### deal-impl
- DealTimeoutScheduler (@Scheduled fixedDelay=30s)
  1. Poll: SELECT FROM deals WHERE deadline_at <= now()-5min AND status NOT IN (terminal) LIMIT 100 FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED
  2. For each deal:
     a. Acquire Redis lock: lock:deal:{deal_id}
     b. Re-read deal state (prevent stale)
     c. Execute state transition via DealTransitionService
     d. If funded: emit EXECUTE_REFUND → escrow.commands
     e. Emit DEAL_STATE_CHANGED → deal.events
     f. Clear deadline_at

### Timeout Table
- OFFER_PENDING: 48h → EXPIRED
- NEGOTIATING: 72h → EXPIRED
- AWAITING_PAYMENT: 24h → EXPIRED
- FUNDED: 72h → EXPIRED + REFUND
- CREATIVE_SUBMITTED: 48h → EXPIRED + REFUND
- CREATIVE_APPROVED: 48h → EXPIRED + REFUND
- SCHEDULED: 24h → EXPIRED + REFUND
- DELIVERY_VERIFYING: 24h → COMPLETED_RELEASED (if verified) / DISPUTED (if error)
- DISPUTED: 7d → Escalate to operator

### Configuration
- DealTimeoutProperties: poll-interval(30s), batch-size(100), grace-period(5min)
- Per-status timeout durations (configurable)

### Metrics
- deal.timeout.processed{status, outcome}
- deal.timeout.poll.duration

## Подсказки
- FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED — не блокировать другие scheduler instances
- Grace period (5min) — дать время на natural transitions
- Зависит от: Deal State Machine, Redis Locks, Escrow (для refunds)
